tweaks.name: NetworkManager
tweaks.description: Force 2G/3G/LTE connection from the Control Center

tweaks.name: OhMyFlash
tweaks.description: Turn your flashlight off after a configurable amount of time

tweaks.name: Magma Pro
tweaks.description: Change every color of your Control Center

tweaks.name: Goodges 2
tweaks.description: Replace notification badges with colorful labels

tweaks.name: Shy Labels
tweaks.description: Hide App Labels when not scrolling

tweaks.name: WiFiCarrier
tweaks.description: Display the WiFi name as carrier

tweaks.name: ModernDock
tweaks.description: Enable the native iPhone X dock on all devices

tweaks.name: iPadStatusBar
tweaks.description: Enable the modern iPad status bar on all devices

tweaks.name: ShortcutEnabler
tweaks.description: Enable and move around the iPhone X lockscreen shortcuts on all devices
